pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download and Augment the Corpus of Plenary Protocols of the German Bundestag // Data package to disseminate the 'GermaParl' corpus of parliamentary debates of the German Bundestag prepared in the 'PolMine Project'. The package includes a small subset of the corpus for demonstration and testing purposes. The package includes functionality to load the full corpus from the open science repository 'Zenodo' and some auxiliary functions to enhance the corpus.
